title: Pasta
procedure: Boil water in a large pot and add a pinch of salt.
Add pasta and cook according to package instructions until al dente.
Drain pasta and set aside.
In a pan, heat olive oil and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add tomato sauce and season with salt, pepper, and herbs.
Add the cooked pasta to the sauce and toss well.
Serve hot with grated cheese and fresh basil.

title: Burger
procedure: Prepare burger patties with minced vegetables or meat, salt, pepper, and spices.
Grill or pan-fry the patties until fully cooked.
Toast burger buns lightly.
Assemble burger: place patty on bun, add cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, and condiments.
Top with the other half of the bun and serve immediately.

title: Pizza
procedure: Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F).
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough.
Add toppings like cheese, vegetables, and pepperoni as desired.
Bake in the preheated oven for 12–15 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is melted.
Slice and serve hot.

title: Soup
procedure: Chop vegetables like carrots, potatoes, beans, and celery into small pieces.
In a pot, heat olive oil and sauté onions and garlic until fragrant.
Add the chopped vegetables and cook for 3–5 minutes.
Pour in vegetable stock and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 20–25 minutes until vegetables are tender.
Season with salt, pepper, and herbs.
Serve hot with a sprinkle of fresh parsley.

title: Curry
procedure: Chop vegetables such as carrots, bell peppers, potatoes, and peas.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions, garlic, and ginger until golden.
Add curry paste or spices and cook for 1–2 minutes.
Add the chopped vegetables and stir well.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 20–25 minutes until vegetables are tender.
Adjust seasoning with salt and pepper.
Serve hot with rice or bread.

title: Kebab
procedure: Grate or finely chop vegetables like carrots, potatoes, and cabbage.
Mix vegetables with bread crumbs, salt, pepper, and spices to form a dough.
Shape the mixture into small kebabs or patties.
Heat oil in a pan or grill.
Cook kebabs on medium heat until golden brown on both sides.
Serve hot with chutney or sauce.

title: Grilled Chicken
procedure: Marinate chicken with olive oil, garlic, salt, pepper, and herbs for 15–20 minutes.
Preheat grill or oven to medium-high heat.
Place the chicken on the grill and cook for 6–8 minutes on each side until fully cooked.
Check the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
Remove from grill and let it rest for 5 minutes.
Serve hot with vegetables or rice.

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
procedure: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions and drain.
Heat olive oil in a pan, sauté onions and garlic until golden.
Add minced meat and cook until browned.
Pour in tomato sauce and simmer for 15–20 minutes.
Season with salt, pepper, and Italian herbs.
Serve spaghetti topped with the Bolognese sauce and grated cheese.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
procedure: Chop vegetables like broccoli, carrots, bell peppers, and snow peas.
Heat oil in a wok or pan and sauté garlic and ginger for 1 minute.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5–7 minutes.
Add soy sauce, a pinch of sugar, and stir well.
Cook until vegetables are tender but still crisp.
Serve hot with steamed rice or noodles.

title: Paneer Butter Masala
procedure: Cube paneer and lightly fry until golden brown.
In a pan, heat butter and sauté onions and garlic until soft.
Add tomato puree, spices (garam masala, turmeric, chili powder) and cook for 5–7 minutes.
Add cream and mix well to form a rich gravy.
Add fried paneer cubes and simmer for 5 minutes.
Garnish with coriander and serve with naan or rice.

title: Grilled Fish
procedure: Marinate fish fillets with lemon juice, salt, pepper, and herbs for 10–15 minutes.
Preheat grill or oven to medium-high heat.
Grill fish for 5–7 minutes on each side until cooked through.
Remove from heat and drizzle with extra lemon juice.
Serve hot with a side salad or steamed vegetables.

title: Samosa
procedure: Prepare dough with flour, oil, and water.
Make filling with potatoes, peas, and spices.
Roll dough into small circles and cut in half.
Fold into a cone, fill with mixture, and seal edges.
Deep fry until golden and crisp.
Serve with chutney.

title: Nachos
procedure: Spread tortilla chips on a baking tray.
Top with cheese, jalapeños, and beans.
Bake until cheese melts.
Serve hot with salsa and guacamole.

title: Spring Rolls
procedure: Prepare filling with cabbage, carrots, and soy sauce.
Place filling on spring roll wrapper and roll tightly.
Seal edges with water or flour paste.
Deep fry until golden and crispy.
Serve with chili sauce.

title: Classic Mojito
procedure: In a sturdy glass, muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice.
Fill the glass with ice cubes.
Pour in the white rum.
Top with club soda and stir gently.
Garnish with a lime wedge and a sprig of mint.
Serve immediately and enjoy.

title: Mango Lassi
procedure: Combine mango pulp, yogurt, milk, and sugar in a blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
If the lassi is too thick, add a little more milk and blend again.
Pour into tall glasses.
Garnish with a pinch of cardamom or a mint leaf.
Serve chilled.

title: Iced Coffee
procedure: Brew strong coffee and let it cool to room temperature.
Fill a glass with ice cubes.
Pour the cooled coffee over the ice.
Add milk or cream to your liking.
Stir in sugar or your preferred sweetener until dissolved.
Serve immediately for a refreshing boost.

title: Fresh Lemonade
procedure: Juice the lemons to get fresh lemon juice.
In a large pitcher, combine the lemon juice and cold water.
Add sugar and stir vigorously until it completely dissolves.
Taste and adjust sweetness if necessary.
Add ice cubes and lemon slices to the pitcher.
Serve chilled in glasses.

title: Green Smoothie
procedure: Place spinach, banana, and almond milk in a blender.
Add a spoonful of honey or maple syrup for sweetness.
You can also add a scoop of protein powder or chia seeds for an extra boost.
Blend on high speed until everything is smooth and well combined.
Pour into a glass.
Enjoy this healthy and energizing drink right away.

title: Chocolate Cake
procedure: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Mix flour, cocoa powder, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
Add eggs, milk, and butter, then whisk until smooth.
Pour batter into a greased cake pan.
Bake for 30-35 minutes until a toothpick comes out clean.
Let it cool before serving.

title: Ice Cream
procedure: Whisk together cream, milk, sugar, and vanilla extract.
Pour into an ice cream maker and churn until thick.
Transfer to a container and freeze for 4 hours.
Scoop and serve chilled.

title: Brownies
procedure: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Melt butter and chocolate together.
Stir in sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract.
Fold in flour and cocoa powder.
Pour into a greased baking pan.
Bake for 25–30 minutes, then cool before cutting.

title: Cheesecake
procedure: Preheat oven to 160°C (320°F).
Mix crushed biscuits with melted butter and press into a springform pan.
Beat cream cheese, sugar, eggs, and vanilla until smooth.
Pour mixture over crust and bake for 50 minutes.
Chill in the fridge for at least 4 hours before serving.

title: Fruit Tart
procedure: Bake a tart shell until golden brown.
Prepare pastry cream and let it cool.
Fill the tart shell with the cream.
Top with assorted fresh fruits like strawberries, kiwi, and blueberries.
Glaze with a light sugar syrup for shine.
Chill and serve.
